content.question: If <math alttext="x equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator y plus 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of, open parenthesis, y plus 1, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 1, and denominator open parenthesis, y plus 1, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator open parenthesis, y plus 1, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator y, and denominator open parenthesis, y plus 1, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the negative of, open parenthesis, y plus 1, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>
